Mijn SV \"Hello World\" is het portaal v:
My SV "Hello World" is the portal for all members of Study Association "Hello World",
 but non-members can also register for activities via this portal!
 You must be a student of the HBO-ICT degree program at the HZ University of Applied Sciences.
